PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Select it to open input options

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Tilt Sensor
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Select it to open tilt sensor options

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Tilt sensor
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable to use tilt sensor.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Tilt as analog
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable to use tilt sensor as analog device, disable to use as digital

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Touch anywhere
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable to tap anywhere on screen to fire. First finger is main fire. Second finger when first finger is pressed is alternate fire

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Swap Z,Y axes
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable to swap Z,Y axes. This fixes vertical tilt on some devices like NVidia Shield.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Touch lightgun
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable to tap on touchscreen as a lightgun. First finger is main fire. Second finger when first finger is pressed is alternate fire. Touch controller must be enabled.

PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Select to map emulator stick and buttons to physical keys. (Xperia Play and any other devices with physical keyboards users should configure their buttons or keys here)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: GamePad disable right stick
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disable right stick when is autodectected
Animated touch control. Disable for huge performance boost

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Vibrate on keypress
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable to vibrate when touch

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Digital touch dead zone
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable Touch Dead Zone

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: P4,P3,P2 as P1
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Allow a single input device to control multiple players at once. Could cause problems in some ROMs

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Save-Load Combo
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable it to press START+R1 to load a game and START+R2 to save a game
